task.title: Delete Company Roles
task.shortdesc: Delete company roles from the Role Administration page.

context.p: When you delete a company role, UltiPro removes role access and associated qualifiers from assigned users. You cannot delete a role when any or all of the following apply:

ul.li: The role is the only role assigned to a user.
The role is assigned as an Approver or Observer role in a business process.
The role is a New Hire default role for the master company.

context.p: A message appears when you attempt to remove a role if it is the only role assigned to a user. Users with no role assignment cannot access UltiPro. It is recommended to remove the users from the role before deleting the role.

step.cmd: From the Role Administration page, check the box for each role you would like to delete.
Select Delete Role. A confirmation message appears.
Select OK. The Role Administration page appears without the selected roles.
